fixes.name: Attrition Rate
fixes.dax_expression: SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Attrition Count ]) / SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Employee Count])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau aggregations to DAX by preserving the SUM functions and converting column references to the 'Table'[Column] format: SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Attrition Count ]) / SUM('HR data (HR Data)'[Employee Count]). No parameters or LODs are present.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
